original_text: Then Shaphan the secretary went to the king and reported to him: “Your officials have paid out the money that was in the temple of the Lord and have entrusted it to the workers and supervisors at the temple.”
korean_text: 서기관 사반이 왕에게 돌아가서 보고하여 이르되 왕의 신복들이 성전에서 찾아낸 돈을 쏟아 여호와의 성전을 맡은 감독자의 손에 맡겼나이다 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Shaphan the secretary went to the king
"Your officials have paid out the money
that was in the temple of the Lord
and have entrusted it to the workers
